channel.title: CVE Feed for Diagon -- Diagon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Diagon -- Diagon

item.title: CVE-2023-27390|2023-07-17T20:34:22.892Z -- diagon -- diagon
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Sequence::DrawText functionality of Diagon v1.0.139. A specially crafted markdown file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-31194|2023-07-17T20:47:16.780Z -- diagon -- diagon
item.description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the GraphPlanar::Write functionality of Diagon v1.0.139. A specially crafted markdown file can lead to memory corruption. A victim would need to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
